export var handleTextArea=function handleTextArea(e,splitterTextArea){var rows=e.target.value.split("\n");var newText="";rows.forEach(function(row){return newText+=row+splitterTextArea;});// use this for the default split .replace(/\\n/g, "\n")
return{target:{value:newText,name:e.target.name}};};export var isDateOn=function isDateOn(type){if(type==="date"||type==="month"||type==="datetime-local"||type==="time")return true;else return false;};export var formateDateValue=function formateDateValue(value,type){if(type==="date")return value.split("T")[0];else if(type==="datetime-local")return value.replace(":00.000+00:00","");else return value;};
